name: Pyro (TimeMelt)
description:
Pyro

In this game you play as a firework named Pyro. Move Pyro right and left (by touch dragging or using arrow keys) to dodge and shoot the raindrops. Pyro shoots firecracker bullets automatically as you move him side to side. The more raindrops you shoot the higher your score grows, but don't get hit or else game over!!!

- Vertical aspect ratio

- Vector Graphics

- Touch and Keyboard input

 - You might need to disable ad/tracker blockers if the game does not load (in browser only)

- Game uses cookies to persistently store high score (in browser only)

Credits:

- Made using Godot Engine 

- Graphics made using draw.io (diagrams.net)
